spec_data.Name: perl-Test-Fatal
spec_data.Description:
Test::Fatal is an alternative to the popular Test::Exception. It does much
less, but should allow greater flexibility in testing exception-throwing code
with about the same amount of typing.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 04:38:11 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Incredibly simple helpers for testing code with exceptions
